properties.name: Ascension Mountain
properties.legend: Active volcano. Height: 60,000 ft

properties.name: Unknown Gate
properties.legend: The Unknown gate is said to be the portal to an unknown realm. Ascension lies behind.

properties.name: Thetford Bridge
properties.legend: An old crossing of the Berford River, rarely used since collapse during the flood

properties.name: The Amber Beaver
properties.legend: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious Cat fish with Honey Squeeze Celestial Red is served here

A historical battle of the Ardg Campaign.

Date: December 15, 236 Eyeverse Era

properties.name: Chiwai Monster
properties.legend: Rumors say a relic monster of 48 ft long inhabits Chiwai Lake. Truth or lie, folks are afraid to fish in the lake

properties.name: Boleforden Monster
properties.legend: Rumors say a relic monster 39 ft long inhabits Boleforden Lake. Truth or lie, folks are afraid to fish in the lake

properties.name: Aberpenner Monster
properties.legend: Rumors say a relic monster of 14 ft long inhabits Aberpenner Lake. Truth or lie, folks are afraid to fish in the lake

properties.name: Khezegh Hag
properties.legend: Tales speak of a terrifying Hag who inhabits Khezegh hills and eats kids whole

properties.name: Uldgezg Giant
properties.legend: Elders speak of a prime Giant who inhabits Uldgezg hills, a previous Eyedity which lost his master and harasses travelers in the area

properties.name: Darton Forest
properties.legend: A sacred forest of Kentian culture

properties.name: Krog Pinery
properties.legend: A sacred pinery of Uruk culture

properties.name: Taiwaiwotin Palm Grove
properties.legend: A sacred palm grove of Guantzu culture

properties.name: King's Heaven
properties.legend: Where the Kingdom's Royal palace lay is based in this area, although it is high in the sky, it is said that this is where the Royal Bicorns roam in a gated community below the Royal Heavens.

properties.name: Culzan Dogs
properties.legend: The castle of the ruthless inhabitants of the Culzan Forest, beings with two eyes, and short 4 foot statures, with powerful arms

properties.name: Cambhirhond Snakes
properties.legend: Lizard like beings reside in this castle, they only come out to hunt small creatures and insects at night

properties.name: Pirates
properties.legend: Pirate ships have been spotted in these waters

properties.name: Travelling Breathtaking Circus
properties.legend: Roll up, roll up, this breathtaking circus is here for a limited time only

properties.name: Travelling Incomprehensible Circus
properties.legend: Roll up, roll up, this incomprehensible circus is here for a limited time only

properties.name: Maringra Contest
properties.legend: Warriors from around the land gather for a contest of speed in Maringra, with fame, fortune and favour on offer to the victor

properties.name: Hawks migration
properties.legend: A huge group of hawks are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary

properties.name: Beavers migration
properties.legend: A huge group of beavers are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary

properties.name: Rooks migration
properties.legend: A huge group of rooks are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary

properties.name: Bisons migration
properties.legend: A huge group of bisons are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary

properties.name: Deer migration
properties.legend: A huge group of deer are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary

properties.name: Fivesoliton festival
properties.legend: A festival has been organised at Fivesoliton as a chance to gather the foreign dignitaries of the area together to be merry, make alliances and scheme around the crisis

properties.name: Entrancing mirage
properties.legend: This entrancing mirage has been luring travellers out of their way for eons

properties.name: Light's Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The newest portal in the dominion built to cater the new King of Golemia.

properties.name: Torkhampsea Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine

properties.name: Royal Portal
properties.legend: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine

properties.name: Interdimensional Rift
properties.legend: A rumoured interdimensional rift in this area is causing cracks in reality itself to form.

properties.name: Ancient Rift
properties.legend: A rumoured ancient rift in this area is causing the life of nearby plants to wither and decay.

properties.name: Light's Landing
properties.legend: The castle where King Light resides formed in the valley created between the two split pieces of the previous King of Golemia.

properties.name: The Phoenix Forge
properties.legend: The Great Phoenix Blazen, the personal pet of Flamos the Deity of Fire, has set it's place in mountains of the beyond. The Forge that allows reincarnation is set.
